data.self_introduce:
With 2 years of experience in developing software and applications using languages/frameworks backend such as C#/.NET, PHP/Laravel, Python, ... and frontend such as Vue, along with tools like Docker for network building, configuration CI/CD, and software deployment, I am confident in my ability to meet the requirement of potential employers. I have also worked with workflow models like Agile-Scrum and Waterfall.
 About my short-term scope is to be a Senior Backend after 5 year and my long term-scope is to become a software solution architect. It so difficult to reach but I will try my best.
